entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:59 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
